sentence: Ron DeSantis, R-Fla., Rep. Matt Gaetz, R-Fla., Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, commentator Candace Owens, former Trump Press Secretary Sean Spicer, and many others.

title: Trump will headline CPAC 2022 next month in Florida

sentence: The Texas Republican senator posted two images of himself at Mar-a-Lago He's in Florida to speak at the Conservative Political Action Conference Thurs Trump was hosting a fundraiser for 2022 GOP congressional candidates Cruz moderated a chat with Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker Tennessee House candidate Morgan Ortagus was also there, along with former Florida AG Pam Bondi, Florida Rep. Mike Waltz and Ohio Rep. Jim Jordan Top-dollar VIP access cost $250,000 per seat, and basic attendance ran $3,000 Texas Senator Ted Cruz revealed he was at Donald Trump's Mar-a-Lago club in on Wednesday, along with a host of national Republican figures who gathered at the Florida resort for a high-profile fundraiser.
author: Elizabeth Elkind
title: Trump meets Ted Cruz at Mar-a-Lago ahead of C-PAC: Republicans and conservative donors mingle at private Florida private club ahead of ex-President's prime-time Saturday night speech

sentence: Prior to Mr. Trump, several other conservative and GOP speakers took the stage, including Ohio Rep. Jim Jordan, Florida Sen. Rick Scott, and Louisiana Sen. John Kennedy.
author: Mica Soellner
title: Trump condemns Russian invasion of Ukraine as an ‘atrocity,’ blames Biden

sentence: Rep. Jim Banks, R-Ind., after saying he would “never, ever apologize for objecting” to Biden’s victory Jan. 6, said he and Rep. Jim Jordan, R-Ohio, were victimized when they were removed from the House committee investigating that day’s attack on the U.S. Capitol.
author: Astead W. Herndon
title: At CPAC, Ukraine and policy take a back seat to cultural grievances

sentence: Rep. Jim Jordan (R-Ohio) said he hoped Trump would run again, while Ohio Senate candidate Josh Mandel declared Trump the winner of the 2020 election.

title: Conservatives Are Warming To The Idea Of A Post-Trump GOP

sentence: You know, everyone loves Jim Jordan here.
title: At CPAC, Trump delivers a reminder of his muscle

sentence: Reps. Scott Perry and Jim Jordan would only offer vague criticism of racism, without criticizing Fuentes, Gosar, or Greene, while Rep. Chip Roy didn't hesitate to be more blunt.
author: Jenn Gidman
title: McCarthy, McConnell Slam Fellow GOPers Over America First Event

sentence: Darrell Issa (R-CA), who was chairman of the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform during former President Barack Obama’s scandal-ridden administration, told Breitbart News exclusively that Republicans are “preparing” for an oversight onslaught after the midterm elections in which they will hold President Joe Biden accountable.Issa, whose high-profile battles with Obama included the IRS targeting scandal, the Operation Fast and Furious gun-walking scandal, the Benghazi terrorist attack scandal, and more, said after the 2022 midterm elections many new faces will join the ranks of oversight veterans like himself and Rep. Jim Jordan (R-OH) in the halls of Congress.
author: Matthew Boyle
title: Exclusive — Darrell Issa: ‘We Are Preparing’ Legion of GOP ‘Watchdogs’ to ‘Hold this President Accountable’

sentence: Ohio Republican Rep. Jim Jordan, along with several other House Republicans, is threatening to allow Disney's copyright on Mickey Mouse to lapse as early as next year.
author: Jon Skolnik
title: Right-wing protesters attempt Disney World "blockade" in support of "Don't Say Gay" law
